overview:
Bastiaan Janmaat is a first year MBA candidate at Stanford Graduate School of Business (GSB). Bastiaan is originally from the Netherlands but he was born in Japan and grew up in Singapore. Bastiaan worked as an analyst for 3 years in Goldman Sachs’ European Special Situations Group (ESSG) in London. In this role, Bastiaan was also a Board Director of Nordic Windpower, an early-stage ESSG portfolio company building two-bladed wind turbines. Bastiaan enjoys playing many sports, including soccer, rugby, and tennis.

Bastiaan is co-founder of LifeSwap - a marketplace for job experiences, through which people are empowered to have unique adventures and experiences of various durations. Think of a job you’ve always been curious about, whether as a voyeur or for career exploration - LifeSwap allows you to see what the job is really like. Work in a bakery for a morning, experience a day as an advertising executive, or shadow a Stanford athlete. Visit: www.TheLifeSwap.com.
